website_summaries.verdict: Comfort meets performance in this luxurious gaming chair with plenty of features.
pros: If you are looking for a wireless gaming chair with great speakers, this is a powerhouse of a chair that is ideal for long gaming stretches
Most customers find the four speakers to be loud and of good quality, and the subwoofer sounds great
The armrests are comfortable, and the vinyl upholstery is easy to clean
cons: A few customers report issues with volume levels and wireless compatibility with the PS4

customer_reviews.title: Wires switched
customer_reviews.text: Not as loud as I thought, it's loud for the people around you but in the chair the sound is pretty low. ALSO- my speakers were switched... left sound went right and right went left. I had to unscrew both top speakers, feed the wires through the chair to switch them then screw them back in. I tried at the control panel but they are glued in. Frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: Excelent
customer_reviews.text: Is very comfortable, has an excellent sound, quite clear and a good bass. 100%, it is a bit heavy, but it is of very good quality, it comes with all its cables and works very well, if you do not have a nearby power outlet I recommend buying the larger power cable, the rest is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Leonardo H.

customer_reviews.title: The sound from these are amazing and the cushions are exceptionally comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these, 1 for myself and 1 for my wife. The sound from these are amazing and the cushions are exceptionally comfortable. The cons are: The arm rests are very uncomfortable (you will need to purchase a padding more than likely) and the biggest problem i've had with both of these, are the RCA ports. The RCA ports are poorly installed and cheap quality. Both of the chairs' RCA ports fall out almost every time when disconnecting them.
customer_reviews.author: shadowvenn

customer_reviews.title: Very very comfortable, speakers are loud and clear
customer_reviews.text: Very very comfortable, speakers are loud and clear, sub in chair is fantasic for gaming, and easy hook up. It took me less than 15 mins to set everything up and play. It also works great with xbox one. I was curious if it was campiable with the xbox one before I bought the item and didn't really get any firm answers. But to clarify, it's hooked up to my tv rather than the gaming system. But none the less, it works perfect.
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time and money - Wireless is vaporware
customer_reviews.text: I’d give it zero stars if possible. Wireless doesn’t work in any configuration which is the only reason I bought it. I think the company made a plastic box with a button that toggles and LED and call it a “wireless controller”. I have a couple of friends who warned me not to buy it because of their history with chairs made by X Rocker but I did it anyway. Lesson learned. I will be returning it. Save your money and buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: NO CUSTOMER SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: No Sound/No Vibration and NO Customer Support. I tried for 3 days to get help with this chair. We have had family and friends try and just will not work. The chair itself is really nice. but if it doesn't work, it doesn't really matter. Wish X Rocker would have returned my calls for assistance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good and Bad
customer_reviews.text: This chair is awesome when you first purchase it. Although, if you plan to sit in it for long periods of timex—beware. The support on this seat is not good. It wore down in about a month. The metal pokes into the back and the seams are hard. The seat causes numbness in the bottom. The photos show the forever indents from sitting. The surround sound is great. The wireless option is great. The vibration adds to the excitement of intense game playing. Do not use the arm rests as support when getting up from this seat. It is not made to support a person’s weight.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Pfirman

customer_reviews.title: Hope you don't own a current generation gaming console...
customer_reviews.text: ...because if you do, you probably don't have the required RCA audio jacks. What does that mean? You either get to return the chair or shell out another $35 for an "optional" but not optional HDMI audio splitter. Until it arrives, my son is connecting via audio jack on his controller (which, if it works for you, means you don't need the wireless version). A well designed product would have the required HDMI audio splitter incorporated into the transmitter. Chair comfort and sound quality are 5 stars which makes this all the more frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: B. Butte

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable except the armrests
customer_reviews.text: Haven't hooked up the sound yet, but didn't buy the chair for that reason. Comfortable, wish it had a better headrest. It's good for those who are both short and tall. (5'2" and 5'10" tested and were satisfied) The arm rests are horrible, hence my 3 star rating. Instructions basically say not to lean on them. What are armrests for? Either way you wouldn't want to because they are hard like a rock and have sharp edges. Very uncomfortable. Looking to find some type of cushioned cover for them now.
customer_reviews.author: NAmbers

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but horrible instructions and wireless adapter
customer_reviews.text: The speakers sound great. We've not been able to get the wireless connectivity working, perhaps there's some interference in the room, so we've resorted to a wired connection. It's a shame that they included wireless adapter only comes with an option to use batteries (not included) and no power adapter. I purchased the recommended adapter but while it provides the right voltage the female end was too large for the power hole on the wireless adapter. Instructions on how to connect the chair need more detail and clarification
customer_reviews.author: Ride4Life

customer_reviews.title: Longivity may be an issue
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this chair, rocker really, in April 2018, It's now just into Oct 2019 and the vinyl on the seat has started to split. The chair is comfortable for long gaming sessions. Since I purchased a quality pair of headphones I don't find the need to use the chair for anything more than sitting in. Would like to engage the vibration without any sound since I am getting sound from my headphones. I wish the quality of the vinyl was better, it won't be long before it's completely split and my investment in it will be pretty much gone.
customer_reviews.author: Guy Thibodeau

customer_reviews.title: Gamers rejoice back pain no more
customer_reviews.text: absolutely in love with this seat! Simple to assemble, 4 screws an L wrench (included) and 3 minutes is all it takes to set up. Simple to set up, all it takes is some simple auxiliary cable know how to plug this baby in. Rumble feature is neat but does require a higher volume to work, the speakers are also pretty great and the bass is definitely noticeable as well. Overall this seat is easy to setup, easy to use, it’s at an appropriate height to cradle a full grown 5’10” man I highly recommend this chair to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Hugo

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with lack of Bluetooth functionality in 2020
customer_reviews.text: Obviously I should have read a little more in depth but when the description says wireless you assume it’s Bluetooth capable as a stand alone item. Well I was wrong and in 2020 where iPhones and iPads don’t have old tech for plugging in earphones so therefore not compatible with 2018 iPad Pro and newer..... There’s not much that’s not Bluetooth capable out of the box and at $200 this is way behind the times. I now need to buy a $29 battery powered Bluetooth adapter to tape to the side of this otherwise nice chair. Sound is good (plugged in to a 2009 iPad mini....). Functionality is very poor for needing an adapter.
customer_reviews.author: kenneth w.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Speaker placement
customer_reviews.text: The speakers give a static sound that is hard to ignore with wireless. The speakers on the side would be fine if it had a cupping device to help project sound towards my EARS and not the WALL. I didn’t want even try to put the arm rests on as they are not practical, but it’s fine without it. I wanted it for the speaker/seat combo and this really lacks. I had high hopes for it. If you modify the speaker to have cupping things it might work but I’m not trying to do all of that.
customer_reviews.author: BrowniesNmilK

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control on this one
customer_reviews.text: Already disappointed taking it out of the box. Staples coming out and a tear in the leather. Box wasn't damaged at all so it seems it left the factory this way. The chair is comfortable and otherwise good quality. I am struggling now to set up the audio, but had to get a picture of this out there. Off to a bad start... and at 50 lbs theres no way I'm returning it for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Short Term Gaming
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable. For a month or two. The big thing to note is there isn’t enough support under the buttocks area down by the upper thigh. The seat bucket sinks in and the cross support at the end of the chair begins to put too much pressure on the back of my thigh which is uncomfortable at best. Now I can only sit in the chair for about an hour at a time. Power cord isn’t long enough. Volume doesn’t go quite high enough. But the bass and the speakers are pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Mike D.

customer_reviews.title: Clarifying Bluetooth Cap. With Ps4
customer_reviews.text: Claims it is bluetooth enable and it comes with everything you need... wrong. Ps4 requires something to aid output since it doesn't give it off alone. Other than that the sound is amazing, the vibrations make it real (playing ww2) and it's very comfy. If you have a long torso the arms are a little short, but just put a throw pillow under there and you're good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Animalistic

customer_reviews.title: Accurate
customer_reviews.text: I must say that the reviews both positive and negative are quite accurate. Chair is very comfortable. Sounds is great. The could have put a little more cushions in the bottom as you can see your butt marks after two days of using. There is a piece of wood directly behind your thighs that you typically dont feel but they could have used a some more padding. Chair is a little creaky but not to bad. Could be an amazing chair is designed just a little bit better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Gaming Chair
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was super quick! This arrived in a great big heavy box which was a challenge to hide for Christmas. On the other hand, I was pleased that it appeared to be of good quality. My son was able to set it up within minutes. Even though we have recliners in the tv room, he always preferred to sit on the floor. I noticed that he looked uncomfortable and hunched over but wouldn't sit on a recliner. He loves this and uses it every time he plays his video games. We're both happy.
customer_reviews.author: bakermom

customer_reviews.title: Nice chair, crappy electronics
customer_reviews.text: Not much choice out there for Gaming chairs, but my son likes this chair in general. His only peeve is the limited ability for the chair to connect to the audio from the TV and/or X-Box The chair only does one - but not the other. So if he is playing X-Box, he still has to wear his headphones to listen to music while he plays. This is problematic when he is also talking to his friends via his wireless headset. The chair is okay, but the electronics not so much The glitch is that there is just not a lot of choice for these chairs in the industry.
customer_reviews.author: Biagio

customer_reviews.title: Fun while it lasted...
customer_reviews.text: Well, it sounds really great. Not the most comfortable after sitting for a long time, but a pillow helped. I would have given this 4 stars if the darn thing hadn't broken after 3 days of use. When I unplugged the RCA cable, so I could move the chair, the end of the white Jack came out with the cable. Now it makes a horrible static noise. I contacted the company listed on Amazon on 1/12 and have not heard from them as of 1/16. Hopefully I will have better results when I call the number on my next day off.
customer_reviews.author: Guilt Tripper

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunate
customer_reviews.text: Gave 2 stars because chair WAS super comfy. Till it broke. The clamp/pin they give you to hold the two halves together broke 5 months ago. it was flimsy considering how heavy each halves are and VERY difficult to put on to begin with. once broke the halves would not stay together even when sitting in it. peices of wood and metal and screws falling out of it constantly and something sticking into my back. disappointing as for the time i had it it was comfy but VERY poorly put together. do not waste your money unless youre ok with only having it a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect for PS4 & sounds great!
customer_reviews.text: I looked at several brands & decided to go with these. They are a little heavy (kids don't mind they just scoot them across the floor). these are Great chairs for the price & sound is wonderful. Very happy with these (I bought 2 of them). However, I only gave 4 stars because there needs to be more padding around the lower back area all the way thru the curve that ties it into the seat part. I didn't have to buy anything extra to use the wireless feature (except AAA batteries ) & the setup is super easy. Kids play the ps4, watch tv, & play music all the time now thru the chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Luvinme10

customer_reviews.title: Great chair, great sound at a very good price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this initially because I wanted neck support. But Wow I was very pleasantly surprised by the sound quality!! Construction is solid. They give you versatility in supplied cables. I plugged this into my Onkyo receiver with phono to mini adapter that I already had; and then sat back and bathed in the sound! Use for PS4 and movies and music. Comfortable. It is a synthetic leather so doesn’t breathe well. Otherwise this is excellent value for this price.
customer_reviews.author: D. Burtner

customer_reviews.title: audio ports from 1980 and thin imitation leather
customer_reviews.text: Any device like this made after the year 2016 HAS to have bluetooth and HDMI. It is a serious deficiency to not have bluetooth. The HDMI cable took over for RCA cables about the year 2001. It can still be made to work with current technology, but in a impractical way. The leather is fake plastic leather aka pleather, and it is especially thin on the leg pillow. I also think the placement of the audio wires inputs and outputs could have been placed in a better part towards the back of the chair. What I do like is the size, height off the ground and sturdiness of it.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Analogue Wireless Transmitter Causes Squeal Noise
customer_reviews.text: Pros: The chair is comfy. I’m 6’2, and it’s still a good size for me. It was easy to assemble, and I haven’t had any issues with the basic “chair” aspect of it. Cons: The wireless setup depicted in the manual causes a high pitched squealing noise. I checked my TV output, different band channels, and different Aux cords, and the only consistent issue was the wireless transmitter. The customer support was utterly non-helpful. The website linked, xrockernation, links to Godaddy to purchase the domain. The phone number goes straight to voicemail and says “check our website or YouTube channel”. The YouTube channel has no troubleshooting video for this issue, or any other that I see.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not really For xBox
customer_reviews.text: This is just an expensive chair. I bought it specifically for xBox use and there is no way to connect it. They include a BATTERY powered transmitter (there is a plug but you have to purchase separately) that syncs with the chair, but you have to plug the transmitter into a 3mm jack, which the Xbox and TV don’t have. I tried going out from the controller to the chair, but that didn’t work either. So you have to purchase a HDMI adapter to pull the audio to send to the chair. I haven’t done this because it’s ridiculous. In this day and age, I’m shocked that this company can’t make a product utilizing Bluetooth technology to connect.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Very simple to put together. Just open and pin the hook in the back. Install the arms. Very comfortable. Have not tried playing games yet while sitting. It is heavy. Rocks well. Comes with Audio wires and adapter. Have not tried speakers or subwoofer yet. So far I'm pleased with it. It cost a lot so I hope it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Sdc

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I thought but more comfortable that other video game rockers
customer_reviews.text: Pretty comfortable...works as suggested so far. Cushioning / arc of the chair is raised enough off of the floor that someone under 5'8" (estimate) could comfortably bend their knees and place feet on floor while still getting the support from the chair. **Only 2 down falls (worth 1/2 star each to me) was realizing it wasn't already completely put together when we opened it (wasn't expecting needing tools etc) AND iris not very wide. The chair looks much bigger in the picture. With that being said...my teenager who is 5'6 and 170 pounds is comfortable in it.
customer_reviews.author: SaraandG

customer_reviews.title: Ok chair, Very Poor performance of the a audio features, back speaker keeps “cracking” at all times!
customer_reviews.text: Chair came assembled with arm rest which were very easy to install. Sound is very poor, almost no volume, the wireless requires a AAA battery and this runs out in a Day or two of use... so it’s a waste of batteries plus the poor performance was disappointing. If you’re looking for a chair to play, this works but only to sit, don’t expect it to have an immersive experience as it will short deliver. ..and yes, the back speaker “cracks” constantly!
customer_reviews.author: G. Romano

customer_reviews.title: Great chIr
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband as a Christmas gift. Hard to buy for him normally, but I often catch him sitting on the floor when he plays video games in the media room. This was a perfect gift for him. He love it. Spearkers and features work great. Love the headphone jack so I can have a quiet house when the kids play.
customer_reviews.author: AN20

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but the finish cracks and peels after regular use.
customer_reviews.text: We've had this for about a year now. While my son likes it, after regular use, the finish is cracking and peeling. He's not a large boy, so it doesn't make sense to me that it hasn't held up better.
customer_reviews.author: Penquins88

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality & Customer Support Issues
customer_reviews.text: Received product with faulty Control Panel in April of 2017. Contacted Ace Casual Customer Service for support replacing broken parts and follow-up with organization several times over the past 3 months. Received the same email response for each follow-up. "The last ETA we received on this item was mid to late (April, May, Sept, etc.) I apologize for any inconvenience, and please let me know of any questions or concerns. I am happy to help. Purchase at your own risks and do not expect a timely resolution from the customer support team for any issues with the product
customer_reviews.author: Todd Ray

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This thing is actually comfortable. I mean, really comfortable. I sit in it to play games (Destiny) on my Xbox 1 and I can easily go for hours without any discomfort. The sound and bass are also impressive, although not earth-shattering, and really help put you in the game, especially with shooter-types. I'm a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Elrod

customer_reviews.title: Pretty sweet!
customer_reviews.text: Chair is actually pretty cool. I bought it for my 9 year old. I have not personally sat in it, so I can’t speak to comfort, but my son loves it. It looks nice, and the sound is far better than I expected. Bluetooth is sketchy tho. The transmitter is hit or miss. Had to buy a power block for it because it’ll eat batteries up. I don’t want to have to hardwire the chair to the TV/PS4, but I don’t have a lot of confidence in that transmitter.
customer_reviews.author: Definitive X

customer_reviews.title: What a waste!
customer_reviews.text: The speakers don’t work! We’ve tried everything! I waited a whole week for this chair to come in and nothing! Sending it back right now! What a waste. I tried calling customer service and nothing! They didn’t even answer! Don’t buy. There are scuff marks on the chair as well. I’m so upset by this!!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Harper

customer_reviews.title: Excellent chair for a few hours of gameplay.
customer_reviews.text: First of all I'm 6'0" tall and weigh around 175lbs and this chair is a good size for me. It's very comfortable. The only possible negative I could mention would be the lack of padding on the arm rests. It's not a giant issue, but after an hour or two you can notice it a little in your arms. I can't rate the speakers on the chair, because I didn't really buy it for that feature. I may mess with them in the future, but as of now it's not something I'll be using because of my surround sound and Turtle Beach headset.
customer_reviews.author: Alan D. Hovanec

customer_reviews.title: STAY AWAY!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This rocker looks good out of the box, but whatever material it is made f b rom won't last very long. They say it's leather, but if it is, it's the cheapest leather on the planet. After only 6 months of use, the seating surface started to crack and split. When I contacted the manufacturer, they said, "Sorry...90 day warranty only." They know damn well that it's not going to crack after only 90 days, but it damn well shouldn't crack after 120 days! If you're OK spending $200+ on a chair that will start to crack and degrade after 6 months, go for it. Otherwise, STAY AWAY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Frank DiCostanzo

customer_reviews.title: It uses outdated AUX cables!! Do Not Buy!!
customer_reviews.text: There is no way to connect the chair if you have HD. The chair use outdated Aux cables(red and white) for audio. Everything use optical or HDMI for audio. If you do not have aux audio out on your tv or surround sound go to a different brand. DO NOT BUY THIS!!! PS4 players do not buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Felicia

customer_reviews.title: Nice chairs, really do enhance the gaming experience
customer_reviews.text: Nice chairs, really do enhance the gaming experience. Got for our PS4 and works like a charm with the wireless transmitter. I haven't tried using a wired setup, included RCA cables are just too short. Only issue with wireless transmitter is that it eats batteries depending on how much use it gets, so i would recommend getting some good rechargeable batteries. Chairs are fairly comfortable, better for kids than adults. I'm 6'2" and just they are just barely long enough for me and the seat gets quite uncomfortable after prolonged use. All in all, a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JMB

customer_reviews.title: one glitch
customer_reviews.text: This was hard to figure out, if u got urself a tv with no AV out. My samsung doesn't have one and we had to find audio converter to get the sound transmitted to the chair. They should put that on the description box. Other than that material used for the chair is very nice, speaker is pretty loud and clear. Its comfortable as well. We have ps4.
customer_reviews.author: batbayar

customer_reviews.title: Never worked properly.
customer_reviews.text: It never worked properly. Garbage. The audio never worked properly. It was staticky at best. You have to be near a plug, so positioning was tricky. The instructions sucked and not easy to understand. Only positive is that the chair is sturdy. Just and overpriced floor rocker.
customer_reviews.author: Ursula

customer_reviews.title: Great but could be a bit better
customer_reviews.text: Needs to hook to headphone 3.5 jack or RCA (red, white) output. A xbox does not have these. If you have a smart TV I'm sure you are in good shape but if you are using a monitor u will need a optical to 3.5 mm converter (it is about 15 bucks).. Chair volume also controls vibration, It would be better if these were seperate so you could volume down when your mic is on and still be able to feel the vibration.. All in all it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent chair if you have the money to buy brand new
customer_reviews.text: The chair is definitely a cool investment if you're big into gaming and want a neat chair to play in. My chair came damaged (I bought a cheaper version that was said to be in "very good" condition however the control panel was busted and it was extremely dusty/dirty) and after 2 weeks of occasional use, 3/4 of the speakers up and quit working so I chose to return it instead of trying to get it fixed. I am sure it probably works better if you get an undamaged version of the chair, however I figured it wasn't really worth the headache of contacting customer support about it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryna Napier

customer_reviews.title: SUPER comfortable and really easy to build on your own
customer_reviews.text: SUPER comfortable and really easy to build on your own. I just wish there weren’t so many wires to deal with. But I’m fine using it just as a chair. Definitely makes playing my PS4 a better experience
customer_reviews.author: Jen A

customer_reviews.title: We plugged it into our audio system (doesn't actually plug into the PS4) and it works great. However
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son for Christmas and he really likes the sound and the rumble. We plugged it into our audio system (doesn't actually plug into the PS4) and it works great. However, about a week ago, the power wouldn't stay on with the switch engaged. I contacted customer service and within 2 days, they sent a replacement control panel. I had seen a few reviews where the customer service wasn't great, but I totally disagree. Got the panel today and the chair works great! Awesome to see such good customer service and the chair is very solid. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J. Eric Cribbett

customer_reviews.title: Best sounding and feeling chair
customer_reviews.text: Best sound. The wireless module eats batteries. Plug in direct to Jack's and the quality increases. I use this as my sound system even when not gaming. The woofer is just amazing. Quality and comfort top notch.
customer_reviews.author: James Buckley

customer_reviews.title: GAME ON!
customer_reviews.text: I had to replace my previous gaming chair and this one is amazing. It's comfy, the arm rests are good, and I plug in the headphones so not to bother anyone. I HIGHLY recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Web Shopping Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a chair that was attractive, comfortable, and would a good fit for our tall son. This was a great buy for sure! Material looks nice. It folds for easy storage if needed, but is kind of large if you are expecting to tuck away somewhere. We close it to keep our cats off the nice material of the chair.
customer_reviews.author: Deedee Martinez

customer_reviews.title: He loved it, but 2 months using it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for Christmas. He loved it, but 2 months using it, the speakers messed up. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Grant

customer_reviews.title: wireless transmitter does not work after a couple of months
customer_reviews.text: This chair looks good and sturdy, but the wireless transmitter stopped working in a couple of months of time. So disappointed with wireless transmitter and now it cannot be used wirelessly.
customer_reviews.author: sureshkm

customer_reviews.title: i don't usually do reviews but this chair is amazing. i did my research literally on this chair ...
customer_reviews.text: i don't usually do reviews but this chair is amazing. i did my research literally on this chair and a few others to see which is best and was just sold on this one with the sound system. the 4 speakers, 2 on the bottom sides, 2 on the top sides giving you that surround sound with the subwoofer in the back. the chair does not sound cheap at all. it completely surprised me. definitely worth the cost. i have mine connected directly to the back of my tv. i was worried at first about the connectivity but everything comes in the box and simple to connect. everything functioned exactly as it described. i definitely recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace gaming chair I had since the 80's. The support and comfort doesn't even compare. The old one is now on the back porch for the dog to sleep in
customer_reviews.author: Stoney Williams

customer_reviews.title: This chair is amazing and a must buy for a person that loves gaming and music
customer_reviews.text: The chair itsself is verry comfortable except for the Viberation thing in the back but i put a blanket on it and its all fine. The chair has awessome speakers, i have a bose soundlink at $130 and it has better base and better sound which is amazing. There is not much bad things i can say about this product. But if you want a chair that is comfortable and versitile and that can play beastly music better than a bose speaker then this is for you
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my Son for Christmas--now broken
customer_reviews.text: Initially we loved this gaming chair. I bought it for my 13yr old for Christmas...he loved it for gaming and watching TV...the surround sound is great and its perfect for his almost 6ft frame. It's very comfortable and even though it's close to the floor, even us older folks enjoyed sitting in it. It is very loud though so he didn't use the sound very often. However, after only a couple of months of light use...the sound went out last week and of course it is now not returnable and I have no way of contacting the seller for a warranty issue or exchange. Disappointed, but at least it's still a comfy seat for gaming
customer_reviews.author: amwitch29

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality! I purchased this for my husband and ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality! I purchased this for my husband and he loves it! My son wants one now too. The speakers are excellent and depending on what game you are playing the chair will actually vibrate. Great find!
customer_reviews.author: MechInspector

customer_reviews.title: Good gaming chair
customer_reviews.text: Overall good gaming chair. Arm rests aren’t very comfortable and after sitting awhile, the crease on the chair hurts your butt unless you shift your position a certain way. Sound quality is excellent though. Super loud and immersive.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Barker

customer_reviews.title: Decent unit although somewhat heavy.
customer_reviews.text: Good back and head support, relatively easy assembly. The chair folds in half and there is a locking pin to keep the units secure. The pin on this one was off center by 1/2" and required a lot of convincing (2 large pliers and a 20 oz. hammer) to make them connect. The armrests are hard plastic and offer no cushion. The seat could do well if it had a bit more cushion. All in all it is an attractive piece that exhibits a moderate amount of detail. We have not connected all the speakers--haven't needed them.
customer_reviews.author: Richard N.

customer_reviews.title: Arms rest are a little sharp.
customer_reviews.text: I just sit in it dont even care about the vibration feature. Good for a chair, allows good leg spread, wide or long. Only quip i have with it is the armrests, they assemble fine but the shape of them is sharp and angular. So if you bonk your leg on the front edge of the arm rest therell be a bruise.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: WORST EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS THE WORST CHAIR ON THE MARKET. PURCHASED 1 year ago and has never connected correctly to TV, PS4, nothing. You would think they would know. It’s now folded over and makes a better side table
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming chair!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son for Christmas. He absolutely loves it. Has great sound and he loves the vibration when playing a game. We did have to purchase a Digital to Analog Converter (for $14.99) since our TV doesn’t have a headphone jack so the speakers would work on the wireless set up. I love the fact that it folds in half when not in use. Seems to be very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are AMAZING! The comfort, build quality, sound and the vibration coming from these are just incredible. Bought 2 for my boys Christmas gifts and they love them. Simple to setup and comes with everything you need as well. We purchased the power supply for them and the boys said it made a difference in sound and vibration. I highly recommend this chair if you are looking for a great gamers chair.
customer_reviews.author: Lou Flora

customer_reviews.title: 1 Audio Gaming Chair is has excellent sound! I watch movies and listen to music ...
customer_reviews.text: The X Rocker 51259 Pro H3 4.1 Audio Gaming Chair is has excellent sound! I watch movies and listen to music while seated. The speakers maintain clarity even at loud volume, and their proximity to your ears provide an extraordinary sense of realness to films. This chair "would" be perfect if it weren't for the awful wireless feature. It simply does not work! They would have had an outstanding product had they used Bluetooth, but instead, it's a wireless radio frequency thing that works so poorly, it seriously takes away from this otherwise exceptional product.
customer_reviews.author: NYCJF

customer_reviews.title: Nice chair. A little low to the ground for an adult.
customer_reviews.text: This chair is very nice. Very comfortable. Speakers sound good. Only thing is that it isn't high off the ground, though I knew that going into my purchase. I built a box out of 2x6's that is 2 feet wide, 3 feet long, and roughly 6 inches high. Put a sheet of plywood on top, and a piece of carpet on top of that. Now it's excellent! I'm 5'11" tall, so if this helps anyone then that's great.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Heegeman

customer_reviews.title: Decent, with a few things to make it work great.
customer_reviews.text: Sound and subwoofer work great. RCA input only. This was a slight problem with my setup as my receiver only has HDMI out. Therefor I had to buy an HDMI/RCA audio extractor (Cyelee Full HD 1080P 3D HDMI to HDMI + Optical SPDIF + RCA L / R Audio Video Extractor Converter works good). There is a slight audio delay that creates an echo effect, so for dialogue I tend to turn down my chair and then turn it back up during action. It's slightly uncomfortable by itself, but with a few pillows it's super comfortable and I sit for hours in it with no problem. Fun stuff, I recommend it for gamers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My fiance is a gamer and loves this product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my fiance for Christmas and he loves it! It came in a huge box and was well padded. It was intact and looks great. It's very comfortable and has all the controls at your fingertips. The cord to plug the chair in is not very long and it is hard to move the chair around because it is heavy. However, my fiance loves it and these are only small shortcomings compared to the great speakers, comfort, and ease of use of the chair. He's very picky about anything electronic and anything gaming and loves this chair.
customer_reviews.author: wifey14

customer_reviews.title: Still loving it years later
customer_reviews.text: My son has had this gamer chair for several years now, and he still loves it. It has retained full functionality and comfort. The only issue is that the faux leather is cracking in the seat from him using it daily, but honestly that was expected over time. Other friends' kids have already thrown out their gamer chairs due to lack of comfort. This gamer chair is not one you'll have to worry about. It's definitely above the rest! Highly recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Bre

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: The chair was hard to assemble and the seat cushion was cheap. I had to send the chair back. If you don't agree watch a video review of the chair on YouTube.
customer_reviews.author: Customer from the Bronx

customer_reviews.title: Stereo set up incorrectly. Bad Quality Assurance. Do not recommend shelling out the money for this chair.
customer_reviews.text: Stereo was reversed. When using the RCA input, I had to reverse the colors (red into white, and white into red) to get left channel to play in the left speaker. For the 1/8" jack, the speakers were also reversed. My guess is bad quality assurance and someone not doing the wiring job correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Kilgore Trout

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend this in the future
customer_reviews.text: The audio for the chair broke after about 6 months of use so it ended up just being a silent gaming chair. While it wasn't uncomfortable, it isn't meant to be used for long periods. Would not recommend this in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Butters

customer_reviews.title: He says it’s the perfect gaming chair
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my boyfriend and he loves it! He’s 5’11 around 170 lbs and fits comfortably into the chair. It paired well with his PS4. The built in speakers are amazing, they’re actually louder than our tv lol. Very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sade

customer_reviews.title: The highest quality gaming chair to be found!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my nephew last Xmas for only $120 and have ALWAYS regretted not buying one for myself. It's very difficult to find for less than $200 and for good reason. The sound is outstanding. I sometimes use it just to watch movies. The vibration is powerful and the ability to listen to anything wirelessly is damn near priceless. My only gripe is it didn't come with a swivel stand like my nephew's. It is just a rocker.
customer_reviews.author: Magical Pony

customer_reviews.title: Foam in chair is poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Audio sounds great, setup was easy. Cons: Wireless adapter always going to sleep Foam in chair is cheap. After having the chair for about 2 weeks and spending about 30-40 hours in the chair the foam has crushed in and not recovered, as you can see in the picture, I can now feel the wood in the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Cunard

customer_reviews.title: So close to awesomeness
customer_reviews.text: A perfect product for long time gaming. Etgonomic design; 4.1 surround speakers; vibration effects like dbox and all wireless. What else would you expect?! I have a ps3 and the chair is connected to it. I am in love with this and it is one of the best experiences I had watching Transformers movie from Amazon Prime. Awesome sound quality. Wouldve given 5 stars if there was a power adapter provided alongside the wireless transmitter. I had to buy them separately. It has a dc supply through aaa batteries too but the batteries Wont even last for 3 days.
customer_reviews.author: Vijay

customer_reviews.title: High quality with excellent head and back support
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my son whose 12. He spends a lot of time on his XBOX and this chair works well for him. Great support. Won’t tip over like the higher up gaming chairs. We have yet to connect the sound and vibration feature but I understand it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Bikini Pro

customer_reviews.title: major improvement
customer_reviews.text: Works very well in initial testing, it would be better if the speakers were baffled to direct toward the front instead straight out the sides. However the speakers sound good and can get quite loud. Had some initial issues but got it resolved. FYI- if the wireless feature is on then chair will not process input from any other source (RCA jacks, Headset jack etc)and vice-verse. If you are plugging directly into the chair, make sure wireless is OFF. Recommend the wireless as it is fewer cords going to the chair to get tangled up with.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Romeo

customer_reviews.title: Great chair!
customer_reviews.text: Best gaming chair we’ve bought to date! We’ve spent a lot of money on gaming chairs & this one has been the most durable & comfortable. Definitely even can handle bigger kids. I mean I can even sit in it comfortably & I’m 5’ 7”.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel B

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my husband who loves gaming. The only downside to the chair is that his headphones have better sound quality when playing modern warfare so he can actually hear where footsteps are coming from. So really not even a knock on the chair, but more so just his own preference. The assembly and setup were super easy especially with instructions included. Thrilled with this purchase to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Great comfortable gaming chair
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend LOVES this chair. He always compliments how comfortable it is and he sits in it for hours playing video games. Definitely would recomend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Starting to fall apart, but have had good use for a couple years. The chair is really heavy, but fairly well built - much better than most. Little pieces of cement are now starting to crumble out of chair onto floor with normal use. Needs a usb port! Would recommend. Sound is vety good, so is vibration.
customer_reviews.author: AWA

customer_reviews.title: hard to get multiple chairs connected.
customer_reviews.text: Chair seems to be built pretty well. I am having a terrible time getting these to connect to our system wireless. Documentation is very sketchy and I am still since Christmas having no luck getting the three chairs to connect. It is very disappointing to have my grand kids continually ask when their chairs will work. One unit had something clunking around inside the chair and I am ready to return them. I have spent over $600 and no luck all working together.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Good things are not hard to find you have to just look
customer_reviews.text: It was really hard to find my hibs the perfect gaming chair that would not hurt his back, and was easy to more around. This is it I even think its comfortable best gaming chair yet!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than most on the market
customer_reviews.text: My guys love these chairs for gaming. It was a little time consuming and confusing trying to figure out how to use the bells and whistles in a home with multiple gaming systems, but worth the effort.
customer_reviews.author: Lorilei A Valeri

customer_reviews.title: The arms are super flimsy, doesn't go together all that well but ...
customer_reviews.text: The arms are super flimsy, doesn't go together all that well but the chair itself is pretty comfortable. Make sure you have an extension cord though.
customer_reviews.author: ChillC

customer_reviews.title: Wow very impressed
customer_reviews.text: I was thinking, $200 chair expect $200 quality, As ALWAYS Amazon has great stuff for the price! Great chair, my son is loving it big time!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Owens

customer_reviews.title: Great chair worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t usually post reviews unless something is really bad but OH MAN! This is such a GREAT chair! Got it for my boyfriend and he loves it! Great buy Best of all you can put it were ever you like and it doesn’t necessarily need to be used as a game chair! Would definitely recommend to everyone Looking for a game chair or a multi purpose chair.
customer_reviews.author: jenny campos

customer_reviews.title: Amp failed after 9 months of casual use.
customer_reviews.text: Chair no longer turns on, checked power supply with multimeter and outputting 12VDC correctly. Customer service impossible to contact via phone, left a voice message yet to respond. Have also submitted an email requesting info on how to replace the amp. Havent heard back, will update as saga continues.
customer_reviews.author: JamZero

customer_reviews.title: and this one was consistently ranked as one of the best. Shipment was fast
customer_reviews.text: Bought this chair for my grandson - he loves it! I researched reviews on gaming chairs, and this one was consistently ranked as one of the best. Shipment was fast, and the product is well-made. The chair folds for storing out of the way if needed. The sound from the four speakers and sub is loud and clear enough for games or music. The chair is comfortable, and big, sturdy enough for a xx-large adult to use with the arms removed.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Loved by everyone
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my sons and husband for gaming as the chair we had was pitiful and falling apart. It is very comfortable and solid piece of furniture. Folds down easily. Great product for the price. The kids were stoked as this was there Santa gift.
customer_reviews.author: K. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Yes buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this chair! Easy assembly, perfect size, sound is awesome too! I spent quite some time looking and comparing chairs for a 12 yes old boy Christmas present, till I finally chose this one, and neither of us were disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: This chair looks cool, but it the most uncomfortable chair ever
customer_reviews.text: This chair looks cool,but it the most uncomfortable chair ever! Maybe I got a defective one? There is a large spring bulging out at base of seat which makes it unusable,I tried emailing x-rocker and got o reply as of yet,great buisness they run over there!
customer_reviews.author: joe andujar

customer_reviews.title: The sound system is surprisingly really great. Only downfall is if you want it to ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son for Christmas. It is a huge hit in our house. The sound system is surprisingly really great. Only downfall is if you want it to vibrate or do any of the cool features it has to be plugged in. I would recomend this chair for any gamer/movie watcher!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Rauen

customer_reviews.title: Good chair!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable. It is GREAT when it works correctly. We had some trouble with the hook up because the directions are not great. The sound is good! It fits adults
customer_reviews.author: Lara Gi

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and style
customer_reviews.text: Great quality chair for gaming. My grandsons use them and put them together and they’re 10 and 12. They fold up for storage . I’m buying two more for my house.
customer_reviews.author: Judi from Chicago

customer_reviews.title: ... cant realy use it for an ottoman when folded like i could my playstation game chairs chairs but still ...
customer_reviews.text: could use more seat padding and more than just a cross member frame on the back cant realy use it for an ottoman when folded like i could my playstation game chairs chairs but still nice chair i use it all the time still in new shape everthing works good and have it hooked up to my pioneer audio video reciever sounds so real my neighbors look out into the hallway to check for cars befor stepping out of there apartments they dont want there little doggie getn hit
customer_reviews.author: torch

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with PS4!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for Christmas for my son to work with his PS4, but it doesn't at all. I can't find an adapter for it to purchase on the side either. Waste of time.
customer_reviews.author: rachael miller

customer_reviews.title: Get a regular chair and put speakers near it
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work at all. Been trying to connect it to a Samsung TV with PS4. Tried everything. I think it probably just came broken. Speakers just buzz and crackle. Otherwise it's comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Sergeant Crowley

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Chair but no Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: The seat is sturdy but it's not the most comfortable. Could use more cushioning. Note that this chair does NOT support bluetooth. You need to physically plug in a cord for the speakers to work. Impracticable in this day and age.
customer_reviews.author: PD

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son for Christmas, 2017. No problems as of Sept. 2018. Great Product and my son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: LoriRob

customer_reviews.title: A great value
customer_reviews.text: This chair is comfortable for an adult or child and seems durable. It was relatively easy to put together and the sound system is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: meandmommy

product_meta.title: X Rocker Pro Series H3 Black Leather Vibrating Floor Video Gaming Chair with Headrest for Adult, Teen, and Kid Gamers - 4.1 High Tech Audio and Wireless Capacity - Foldable and Ergonomic Back Support
product_meta.description: Welcome to the world of interactive audio! Regular and professional gamers alike can now not only hear sounds of the game, but actually feel it with the X Rocker Pro Series H3 Video Gaming Chair. Whether you are listening to music, watching a movie, or playing a game, you will become a part of the excitement. The X Rocker Pro H3 has four speakers (more than any other X Rocker!) and a subwoofer that uses Ace Bayou's innovative Audio Force Modulation Technology. This places speakers and ported power subwoofers into the open space - not just the frame - within the X Rocker to magnify sound quality and intensify your experience. The X Rocker Pro H3 also has additional vibration motors that sync with your audio's bass tones to create an even more powerful full-body sensation. The fixed-position gun-stock arms provide extra stability and the heavy-duty padded backrest and headrest will keep you comfortable for hours of gaming. Control panel includes separate volume, bass, and vibration controls, and input and output jacks for connecting to your audio source and to other X Rockers for multi-player games. The wireless receiver is built-in and the box includes your wireless transmitter that will send audio from any source with headset or RCA outputs to your gaming chair. Optional RCA cables also included. Some assembly required - allen wrench included.
feature_bullets: ALL PURPOSE GAMING CHAIR: Leather lounging game chair can be used for playing video games, watching movies and TV, listening to music, reading, and relaxing.

COMPLETE MEDIA EXPERIENCE: Chair incorporates four forward facing speakers, audio force modulation technology, and ported power subwoofers into the open space inside the chair for full immersion in your game, movie, or music.

ADDITIONAL VIBRATION MOTORS: The Pro Series H3 includes additional vibration motors that sync with your audio's bass tones to create an even more powerful full-body sensation keeping you comfortable and entertained for hours.
COMPATIBILITY: Compatible with Xbox, PlayStation, Nintendo Wii, MP3s, DVDs and most other gaming systems. Weight capacity 275 lbs.

CONNECTS WITH MULTIPLE CHAIRS: Control panel includes separate volume and bass controls, and input and output jacks for connecting to your audio source so other X-Rocker chairs can join in multi-game mode.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
